HEIST.Settings.AutoRegisterBabele.Title: Automatically activate translation via Babele
HEIST.Settings.AutoRegisterBabele.Hint: Automatically sets up translations within Babele without needing to point to the directory containing the translations.

HEIST.Settings.DisplayGamePhaseWindowOnL: Displays the game phase window on connection
HEIST.Settings.SmallGamePhaseWindow.Titl: Miniature version of the game phase window
HEIST.Settings.SmallGamePhaseWindow.Hint: Displays the name of the current phase and time remaining for all, as well as control icons for GMs.
